scripts.build: vite build && node scripts/minify-static-assets.mjs && node scripts/externalize-inline-script.mjs
scripts.build:bio: CONTENT_VARIANT=bio vite build && node scripts/minify-static-assets.mjs && node scripts/externalize-inline-script.mjs
scripts.build:dev: CONTENT_VARIANT=dev vite build && node scripts/minify-static-assets.mjs && node scripts/externalize-inline-script.mjs
scripts.build:full: vite build && node scripts/minify-static-assets.mjs && node scripts/externalize-inline-script.mjs && pnpm run critical-css
scripts.build:full:bio: CONTENT_VARIANT=bio vite build && node scripts/minify-static-assets.mjs && node scripts/externalize-inline-script.mjs && pnpm run critical-css
scripts.build:full:dev: CONTENT_VARIANT=dev vite build && node scripts/minify-static-assets.mjs && node scripts/externalize-inline-script.mjs && pnpm run critical-css
